title.narrative: Livestock protection, through emergency rations, vaccination and borehole rehabilitation

description.narrative: This activity (Livestock protection, through emergency rations, vaccination and borehole rehabilitation) is a component of Livestock & Food Security Humanitarian Programme reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Humanitarian assistance' and a budget of £5,500,000. This component benefits Zimbabwe, and works in the following sector(s): Material relief assistance and services , Relief co-ordination and support services, Immediate post-emergency reconstruction and rehabilitation. , with the following implementing partners: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (FAO). The start date is 01-10-2012 and the end date is 31-10-2013.

participating-org.narrative: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (FAO)
